title: Is Martin Van Creveld's 'The Privileged Sex' a reliable history book? What are the major criticisms that the book received? - Quora

response.answer_text: Full Disclosure: I haven’t read The Privileged Sex, nor am I likely to any time in the foreseeable future . . . life is short, and it’s too far outside the areas I work in to have much of an intellectual return-on-investment for me. That said, a general observation: Any self-published book written by a scholar on a complex subject completely outside their specialty should be approached with extreme caution. Making such a volume the first book you read on the subject in question is a Bad Idea on the level of asking your urologist to perform your upcoming heart-valve replacement. Making such a volume the only book you read on the subject in question is a Bad Idea on the level of asking your barber to perform your upcoming heart-valve replacement.
